name: Experiment Or Die #124
description: Project to create a new collage every day for a year using my years of personal assets. When I graduated high school the first Ipod hadn't even been released yet. I was headed to art school and of course I needed a computer and using my graduation money I was able to buy myself a brand new, Sage green Imac. At that point they had been out for a bit considering Sage was in the 2nd wave of those original Imacs. 4 computers later and I still love the sound it makes when you first hit that power button. I couldn't even tell you how man versions of the OS have come and gone since the year 2000, but I can tell you I miss this smiley face icon that use to greet me as the machine started up. As cliche as it might be, we could always use more happiness in the world. Twitter and IG: Nikejerk.
